titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senate employees and authorize testimony and production of documents in the case of Adamson v. Radosevic, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/28/1988--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Walt Riker, Mike Pettit, and any other current or former Senate employees in the case of Adamson v. Radosevic, et al. Authorizes such employees to testify and produce documents in such case to the extent that such testimony and documents are determined to be both relevant and not privileged.
